instruction: Identify five characteristics of a good team leader.
output:
A good team leader should have the following characteristics: 
1. Good communication skills – they should be able to present ideas and instructions clearly and effectively. 
2. Good interpersonal skills – they should be able to build trust and foster collaboration between team members.
3. Adaptable – they should be able to shift their strategies to best meet the needs of their team
4. Empathetic – they should be able to show compassion towards their team members and take their ideas and feedback into account when making decisions.
5. Organized – they should be able to plan and prioritize tasks efficiently to ensure productivity and progress.
